description: This stuffing recipe perfectly combines the meatiness of the sausage and the sweetness of the apples and caramelised onions.
name: Caramelised Onion, Apple & Sausage Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium apple, de-cored and finely diced
1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced
1 medium red onion, peeled and finely diced
2 cloves garlic, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and fry the sausage meat for 10 minutes until cooked fully through.
Remove the sausage meat from the pan and set to one side. Fry the onions, apples and garlic with the butter in the pan for 5 minutes while stirring.
Combine the breadcrumbs with the rest of the ingredients, then combine with the sausage meat. Now add the melted butter mix into the bowl and combine fully.
Transfer the total mixture to a baking tray and bake for 20 minutes and then remove from the heat.
